sentences.en: A severe infection may cause the appendix to rupture.
sentences.cn: 严重的感染可能导致阑尾穿孔.

sentences.en: After a time Watson's young affections changed, and one day he described the rupture to Philip.
sentences.cn: 过了不久,沃森就另觅新欢了, 一天他给菲利浦讲了他们是怎么断绝关系的.

sentences.en: Certain truck gasoline tanks can rupture and burn in a collision.
sentences.cn: 某些卡车的油箱在碰撞时可能发生爆裂并起火。

sentences.en: He died of an abdominal infection caused by a rupture of his stomach.
sentences.cn: 他死于由一次胃穿孔引发的腹部感染。

sentences.en: His liver was ruptured when a brick wall collapsed on him.
sentences.cn: 一堵砖墙坍塌压住了他，导致他的肝脏破裂。

sentences.en: His stomach might rupture from all the acid.
sentences.cn: 他的胃可能因为这些酸液而穿孔。

sentences.en: However, a pre - existing renal abnormality will increase the risk of rupture.
sentences.cn: 然而, 若存在肾脏的先天性异常则会增加此种破裂的风险.

sentences.en: I can rupture a rule for a friend.
sentences.cn: 我可以为朋友破一次例.

sentences.en: Objective To study the mechanism of spontaneous rupture of hepatocellular carcinoma ( HCC ) .
sentences.cn: 目的探讨 肝癌 自发性破裂的机理.

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo summarize the experiences on and treatment for traumatic liver rupture.
sentences.cn: 目的总结外伤性肝破裂的诊治经验.

sentences.en: Rupture of bridge pavement with cement concrete is a very common problem.
sentences.cn: 水泥混凝土桥面铺装层破损是非常普遍的问题.

sentences.en: Sloshing liquids can rupture the walls of their containers.
sentences.cn: 晃动液体可以使容器壁破裂。

sentences.en: Sudden rupture and displacement occurs with normal, reverse, strike - slip, or oblique - slip faulting.
sentences.cn: 突然破裂和位移伴随正 、 逆 、 走向滑动或斜向滑动断层作用而发生.

sentences.en: The pipe will rupture at its weakest point.
sentences.cn: 管道最薄弱的地方会破裂的。

sentences.en: The resistance of the nonwoven to tensile rupture is the sum of two resistances in parallel.
sentences.cn: 非纺织物对拉伸断裂的阻力是两个并联阻力之和.

sentences.en: the rupture of a blood vessel
The rupture of a blood vessel usually cause the mark of a bruise.
sentences.cn: 血管的突然破裂往往会造成外伤的痕迹.

sentences.en: There is still a danger that the considerable expansion will rupture the building structure.
sentences.cn: 危险仍然存在,因为相当强裂的膨胀,仍将使建筑结构遭到破坏.

phrases.tran_cn: 断裂模量；破裂模数；弯曲极限强度；抗裂系数

trans.tran_cn: 断裂，破裂，友好关系的决裂，[医]疝气
trans.tran_en: an occasion when something suddenly breaks apart or bursts
an occasion when something suddenly breaks apart or bursts
to break or burst, or to make something break or burst

trans.tran_cn: 使破裂，断绝（关系等），发生疝，使不和
